name: Out of Controls (PxGluz)
description:
Game done by me in 48 hours. Everything, including the art and the code, is done by me, except for the sounds, those were not made by me, but edited by me.

An unidentified creature rests in your laboratory and now it's trying to get out! Do your best to keep it at bay by stabilizing its container and killing its tentacles, while he is impairing your ability to use your controls. Thankfully you are prepared for the situation, with your trusty gun and medicine created to counterattack the monster's hypnotic effects. Try to aim for a highscore and post it in the comments below!

Thank you for checking my game out! And don't forget to rate it on the GMTK submission page.

CONTROLS:

  • W,A,S,D - Move
  • Left Click - Shoot
  • E - Interact
  • Q (Spam) - Use medicine

Menu and Game Song : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=y_EPv3I6We8
